name: Lost Relic [Demo]
description:
First and foremost: Thanks for trying out my game.

The initial idea for this game was during a gamejam, you can check it here.

This demo has 4 levels and a boss in the end were you have to use the enviroment to kill it, this will be the main mechanic of the game, the main character will only move and use the enviroment to fight against the enemies.

Commands:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Character movement
  • W - Use switches or get torches on the walls when yours is turned off

Theres a lot to improve, like the boss animations and mechanics and I plan to add:

  • BG Musics
  • More levels in different enviroments
  • More enemies and bosses
  • A backstory with the reason why the main characther is exploring these dangerous dungeons
  • Level selection and rating system, where your score will be better the least you die
  • Difficulty selection, that will make the enemies and traps more weak/strong, slow/fast, have checkpoint in the easy levels and reset the level in the difficult ones and more things will be twiked

Thank you for playing, and fell free to leave a feedback for me to improve!
